it.polito.verifoo.rest.common

Class ConditionExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.verifoo.rest.common.ConditionExtractor

  • public class ConditionExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class hides all the complexities regarding the z3 deployment constraints. It creates a boolean z3 expression, from a string formatted in a specific way, considering a certain number of complexities

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConditionExtractor(com.microsoft.z3.Context ctx, AutoContext autoctx, Node n, java.util.List<Connection> connections, java.util.HashMap<Node,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr>> conditionDB, java.util.HashMap<Node,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr>> stageConditions)
      Sets up the enviroment to retrieve the information to return the right boolean expression from a string (it also saves it in a specific data structure)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConditionExtractor

        public ConditionExtractor(com.microsoft.z3.Context ctx,
                          AutoContext autoctx,
                          Node n,
                          java.util.List<Connection> connections,
                          java.util.HashMap<Node,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr>> conditionDB,
                          java.util.HashMap<Node,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr>> stageConditions)
        Sets up the enviroment to retrieve the information to return the right boolean expression from a string (it also saves it in a specific data structure)
        Parameters:
        ctx - the z3 context
        autoctx - the z3 auto-context which holds all the informations about the auto-placement
        n - the node subject of the
        connections - the list of connections between the hosts needed to retrieve the specific deployment latency
        conditionDB - the reference to the external data structure that contains all the deployemnt conditions
        stageConditions - the reference to the external data structure that contains only a part of the deployemnt conditions

    • Method Detail

      • DeploymentConditionFromString

        public com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr DeploymentConditionFromString(java.lang.String s,
                                                               Node client,
                                                               Node server,
                                                               java.util.List<Node> nodes,
                                                               java.lang.String hostClient,
                                                               java.lang.String hostServer)
        Public method that receives a string that represents a deployment and returns the correspondent boolean expression
        Parameters:
        s - the string that needs to be translated
        client - the node that represents the client
        server - the node that represents the server
        nodes - nodes the list of all the nodes in the service graph
        hostClient - the host on which the client node will be deployed
        hostServer - the host on which the server node will be deployed
        Returns:
        the z3 boolean expression of the string
